meanings.definition: A person engaged in or experienced in warfare.
meanings.sent1: The brave warrior fought in many battles.
meanings.sent2: The warrior trained hard to become a skilled fighter.
meanings.sent3: The warrior tripped over his own sword during training, much to the amusement of his comrades.
meanings.sent4: She was a warrior on the soccer field, always ready to defend her team.
meanings.sent5: The image of the warrior charging into battle stayed with him long after the story ended.

meanings.definition: A person who shows great vigor, courage, or aggressiveness in a struggle or conflict.
meanings.sent1: The young warrior faced his fears and stood up to the bully.
meanings.sent2: She was a true warrior for justice, always fighting for what was right.
meanings.sent3: The little warrior bravely tried to rescue his toy from the top shelf.
meanings.sent4: Her determination made her a warrior in the world of business.
meanings.sent5: The warrior spirit within her never wavered, even in the face of adversity.
